segments.text: This is such a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and the woman doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so reckless, and she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall and hurt himself if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve ever been taught to be more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should really pay more attention to what’s happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone steps in before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
